00024 class TSimComponentsFactory: public TSimComponentWrap<Base>, public istd::TIFactory<icomp::IComponent>

00026 public:
00027        typedef TSimComponentWrap<Base> BaseClass;

00042 // public methods
00043 
00044 template <class Base>
00045 TSimComponentsFactory<Base>::TSimComponentsFactory()
00046 {
00047        m_factoryKeys.push_back(istd::CClassInfo::GetName<Base>());
00048 }
00049 
00050 
00051 // reimplemented (istd::IFactoryInfo)
00052 
00053 template <class Base>
00054 istd::IFactoryInfo::KeyList TSimComponentsFactory<Base>::GetFactoryKeys() const
00055 {
00056        return m_factoryKeys;
00057 }
00058 
00059 
00060 // reimplemented (istd::TIFactory<icomp::IComponent>)
00061 
00062 template <class Base>
00063 icomp::IComponent* TSimComponentsFactory<Base>::CreateInstance(const std::string& keyId) const
00064 {
00065        if (keyId.empty() || (keyId == m_factoryKeys.back())){
00066               icomp::IComponent* retVal = new TComponentWrap<Base>();
00067               if (retVal != NULL){
00068                      retVal->SetComponentContext(this, this, false);
00069                      return retVal;
00070               }
00071        }
00072 
00073        return NULL;
00074 }
